localised_description.last_approved_text: "Why do you continue to overlook me? My martial leadership skills are known to all! Give me command of one of our armies or I shall take my abilities elsewhere. Then, one day you may find yourself facing me on the other side of the battlefield!"

dilemmas.localised_description: "Why do you continue to overlook me? My martial leadership skills are known to all! Give me command of one of our armies or I shall take my abilities elsewhere. Then, one day you may find yourself facing me on the other side of the battlefield!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: "You have ignored my considerable talents for too long, even though I am undoubtedly deserving of an administrator’s position in your court. Grant me jurisdiction over one of our commanderies or I shall seek another warlord who will better value my services!"

dilemmas.localised_description: "You have ignored my considerable talents for too long, even though I am undoubtedly deserving of an administrator’s position in your court. Grant me jurisdiction over one of our commanderies or I shall seek another warlord who will better value my services!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: "I have kept quiet about this up to now, but I can hold my tongue no longer. There are clearly no better candidates to hold this office. I urge you to give me this opportunity or I will have no choice but to offer my assistance to another!"

dilemmas.localised_description: "I have kept quiet about this up to now, but I can hold my tongue no longer. There are clearly no better candidates to hold this office. I urge you to give me this opportunity or I will have no choice but to offer my assistance to another!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: Many people have come forward offering to join our humble cause. What virtues should we most look for in the volunteers?

dilemmas.localised_description: Many people have come forward offering to join our humble cause. What virtues should we most look for in the volunteers?

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Age of Great Peace has finally come, and with it the divine Mandate of Heaven is ours at last! To whom the mantle of rulership has passed is not certain however, as the signs keep pointing to two different candidates. One is a peasant with a humble background. The other the son of an ancient noble line, that joined the rebellion in its early stages. \n\n As the great virtuous master, the people turn to you to make the final decision.

dilemmas.localised_description: The Age of Great Peace has finally come, and with it the divine Mandate of Heaven is ours at last! To whom the mantle of rulership has passed is not certain however, as the signs keep pointing to two different candidates. One is a peasant with a humble background. The other the son of an ancient noble line, that joined the rebellion in its early stages. \n\n As the great virtuous master, the people turn to you to make the final decision.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Taipingjing teaches us the world is in perpetual chaos; balance can only be found by cultivating our inner Dao. Under the gaze of heaven, incense is burned, sermons sung and music played. Those around are filled with vigour and belief in the cause and look to you to lead them in worship.

dilemmas.localised_description: The Taipingjing teaches us the world is in perpetual chaos; balance can only be found by cultivating our inner Dao. Under the gaze of heaven, incense is burned, sermons sung and music played. Those around are filled with vigour and belief in the cause and look to you to lead them in worship.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As our teachings decree that all should have a fair share, as each and every person is equal under the rule of Huang-Lao. We have gained a bountiful amount of gold from our recent endeavours, and must decide how to use it.

dilemmas.localised_description: As our teachings decree that all should have a fair share, as each and every person is equal under the rule of Huang-Lao. We have gained a bountiful amount of gold from our recent endeavours, and must decide how to use it.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Many people have come forward offering to join our humble cause. What virtues should we most look for in the volunteers?

dilemmas.localised_description: Many people have come forward offering to join our humble cause. What virtues should we most look for in the volunteers?

localised_description.last_approved_text: This warrior is learned in the Way, as proved in battle. The righteous fury of the disenfranchised guides their blade against our oppressors, and they are therefore recommended for promotion.

dilemmas.localised_description: This warrior is learned in the Way, as proved in battle. The righteous fury of the disenfranchised guides their blade against our oppressors, and they are therefore recommended for promotion.

localised_description.last_approved_text: With the land of chaos filled with Yin, warriors strong with Yang are needed to help restore harmony. This captain proves their mettle and is therefore recommended for promotion.

dilemmas.localised_description: With the land of chaos filled with Yin, warriors strong with Yang are needed to help restore harmony. This captain proves their mettle and is therefore recommended for promotion.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your seers foretell of a great talent that will rise from your own ranks, and we believe we have found them. This captain’s ears stretch almost to their chin, their beard is long like a dragon’s tail, and they cut through enemies as if they were silk.

dilemmas.localised_description: Your seers foretell of a great talent that will rise from your own ranks, and we believe we have found them. This captain’s ears stretch almost to their chin, their beard is long like a dragon’s tail, and they cut through enemies as if they were silk.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A captain in your army displays an exceptional understanding and control over their Qi. Each movement flows effortlessly to the next, making them an exceptional warrior on the battlefield, and a candidate for promotion.

dilemmas.localised_description: A captain in your army displays an exceptional understanding and control over their Qi. Each movement flows effortlessly to the next, making them an exceptional warrior on the battlefield, and a candidate for promotion.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This warrior’s trust and devotion in your guidance is unshakeable, and they excel in spreading their beliefs among the people they fight alongside. This is a commendable and inspiring skill, and as such, they are recommended for a battlefield commission.

dilemmas.localised_description: This warrior’s trust and devotion in your guidance is unshakeable, and they excel in spreading their beliefs among the people they fight alongside. This is a commendable and inspiring skill, and as such, they are recommended for a battlefield commission.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Many of our soldiers are folk with a simple desire for a better world, but as diamonds are extracted from coal, heroes can be hewn from humble beginnings.

dilemmas.localised_description: Many of our soldiers are folk with a simple desire for a better world, but as diamonds are extracted from coal, heroes can be hewn from humble beginnings.

localised_description.last_approved_text: One of your captains involved in pacifying a settlement is leading ceremonies with the faithful. Their eyes are as striking as jade, and their voice resonates as if their words were spoken in a cavern. This gives them great authority with the people, and they are followed unreservedly.

dilemmas.localised_description: One of your captains involved in pacifying a settlement is leading ceremonies with the faithful. Their eyes are as striking as jade, and their voice resonates as if their words were spoken in a cavern. This gives them great authority with the people, and they are followed unreservedly.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Upon occupying the settlement, disturbing events spark talk of evil spirits within the walls. One of your captains, a pure follower of the Tao, is seen writing talismans to place on the doors of those areas afflicted, proving themselves to be a true devotee.

dilemmas.localised_description: Upon occupying the settlement, disturbing events spark talk of evil spirits within the walls. One of your captains, a pure follower of the Tao, is seen writing talismans to place on the doors of those areas afflicted, proving themselves to be a true devotee.
I am a debug event, please don't delete my like you did my brothers and sisters.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have been crafty and patient in your rule; you have said the right things to the right people, and have at last drawn the attention of the empress. Yet your attempt to secure a high office has been blocked by her advisors. \n\n You could appeal to her directly, but her retinue would be displeased...

dilemmas.localised_description: You have been crafty and patient in your rule; you have said the right things to the right people, and have at last drawn the attention of the empress. Yet your attempt to secure a high office has been blocked by her advisors. \n\n You could appeal to her directly, but her retinue would be displeased...

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are known for your pragmatism no matter the odds, and it is in this spirit that one of your household comes forward. They admit to a correspondence with the traitor Sima Liang - treason upon treason! \n\n However, they offer you their services. You know that honour dictates they be arrested, yet their connections may prove useful to you...

dilemmas.localised_description: You are known for your pragmatism no matter the odds, and it is in this spirit that one of your household comes forward. They admit to a correspondence with the traitor Sima Liang - treason upon treason! \n\n However, they offer you their services. You know that honour dictates they be arrested, yet their connections may prove useful to you...

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have heard that a scholar, renowned for his wisdom, is traveling your lands. Were you to host him for a time he may see fit to teach you, and you may learn something valuable from his lessons…

dilemmas.localised_description: You have heard that a scholar, renowned for his wisdom, is traveling your lands. Were you to host him for a time he may see fit to teach you, and you may learn something valuable from his lessons…

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have heard that a scholar, renowned for his wisdom, is traveling your lands. Were you to host him for a time he may see fit to teach you, and you may learn something valuable from his lessons…

dilemmas.localised_description: You have heard that a scholar, renowned for his wisdom, is traveling your lands. Were you to host him for a time he may see fit to teach you, and you may learn something valuable from his lessons…

localised_description.last_approved_text: Whilst you are a fair ruler, it is said by some that you are overly direct and often blunt to the point of rudeness. \n\n This approach has alienated some of the nomadic tribes in your territories, who chafe at your demands for their men and horses...

dilemmas.localised_description: Whilst you are a fair ruler, it is said by some that you are overly direct and often blunt to the point of rudeness. \n\n This approach has alienated some of the nomadic tribes in your territories, who chafe at your demands for their men and horses...

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your advisors recommended you serve the people, and that is what you have chosen to do. Yet the other princes of Jin see this as neglect. They insist you spend more on courtly distractions, to keep them entertained.

dilemmas.localised_description: Your advisors recommended you serve the people, and that is what you have chosen to do. Yet the other princes of Jin see this as neglect. They insist you spend more on courtly distractions, to keep them entertained.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A member of your household comes forward, revealing their treasonous correspondence with Sima Liang. They beg you before the entire court to show mercy, knowing you as a man of honour. \n\n You are compelled to accept, yet to do so may put your entire court in jeopardy...

dilemmas.localised_description: A member of your household comes forward, revealing their treasonous correspondence with Sima Liang. They beg you before the entire court to show mercy, knowing you as a man of honour. \n\n You are compelled to accept, yet to do so may put your entire court in jeopardy...

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your court is known as a haven of entertainment and frivolous distraction. Your princes and courtiers are in a state of constant delight, yet the people want for the succour of their lord's generosity…

dilemmas.localised_description: Your court is known as a haven of entertainment and frivolous distraction. Your princes and courtiers are in a state of constant delight, yet the people want for the succour of their lord's generosity…

localised_description.last_approved_text: The other princes of Jin know you to have the emperor's ear; they implore you to convince him to issue a decree that raises their allowances. \n\n Such a request is transparently self-serving, yet it is undeniable that you too could benefit from this…

dilemmas.localised_description: The other princes of Jin know you to have the emperor's ear; they implore you to convince him to issue a decree that raises their allowances. \n\n Such a request is transparently self-serving, yet it is undeniable that you too could benefit from this…

localised_description.last_approved_text: The emperor recognises you as a dutiful, loyal brother, and in his generosity he offers you a gift. You are honoured by his gesture, yet you know accepting it will make the other princes of Jin envious. \n\n You must think carefully on how to proceed…

dilemmas.localised_description: The emperor recognises you as a dutiful, loyal brother, and in his generosity he offers you a gift. You are honoured by his gesture, yet you know accepting it will make the other princes of Jin envious. \n\n You must think carefully on how to proceed…

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your father, Sima You, was a venerated, highly-regarded lord. His exile was an act of pure envy by a threatened emperor, and was directly responsible for his death. \n\n You have demanded his rehabilitation, yet the emperor denies you still, blaming your arrogance. Both you and your courtiers are enraged by the continued slights...

dilemmas.localised_description: Your father, Sima You, was a venerated, highly-regarded lord. His exile was an act of pure envy by a threatened emperor, and was directly responsible for his death. \n\n You have demanded his rehabilitation, yet the emperor denies you still, blaming your arrogance. Both you and your courtiers are enraged by the continued slights...

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your father, Sima You, was a venerated, highly-regarded lord. His exile was an act of pure envy by a threatened emperor, and was directly responsible for his death. \n\n You have demanded his rehabilitation, and the emperor is considering it, for a price...

dilemmas.localised_description: Your father, Sima You, was a venerated, highly-regarded lord. His exile was an act of pure envy by a threatened emperor, and was directly responsible for his death. \n\n You have demanded his rehabilitation, and the emperor is considering it, for a price...

localised_description.last_approved_text: The plot against you was an act of sabotage from Sima Wei, but your restraint and tact allowed the empress an opportunity to back down. \n\n She acknowledges Sima Wei's part in the plot, and gives you permission to seek your vengeance, should you so desire...

dilemmas.localised_description: The plot against you was an act of sabotage from Sima Wei, but your restraint and tact allowed the empress an opportunity to back down. \n\n She acknowledges Sima Wei's part in the plot, and gives you permission to seek your vengeance, should you so desire...

localised_description.last_approved_text: The empress sees your zeal and, knowing you will not cow before her, has backed down. She blames Sima Wei for the plot against you, which you do not entirely doubt…

dilemmas.localised_description: The empress sees your zeal and, knowing you will not cow before her, has backed down. She blames Sima Wei for the plot against you, which you do not entirely doubt…

localised_description.last_approved_text: Rumours have spread that you, and you alone, are responsible for the hostilities against Wei Guan and Sima Liang. The empress is surely responsible for these rumours, but your restraint in the matter gives people pause. \n\n If you extend a little further generosity, you are sure these vile stories will all-but vanish...

dilemmas.localised_description: Rumours have spread that you, and you alone, are responsible for the hostilities against Wei Guan and Sima Liang. The empress is surely responsible for these rumours, but your restraint in the matter gives people pause. \n\n If you extend a little further generosity, you are sure these vile stories will all-but vanish...

localised_title.last_approved_text: A Whispering Campaign Falls on Deaf Ears

dilemmas.localised_title: A Whispering Campaign Falls on Deaf Ears

localised_description.last_approved_text: Rumours have spread that you, and you alone, are responsible for the hostilities against Wei Guan and Sima Liang. Your recent aggression has done nothing to abate these lies, which fall upon fertile soil. \n\n Perhaps generosity, not belligerence, will change hearts and minds...

dilemmas.localised_description: Rumours have spread that you, and you alone, are responsible for the hostilities against Wei Guan and Sima Liang. Your recent aggression has done nothing to abate these lies, which fall upon fertile soil. \n\n Perhaps generosity, not belligerence, will change hearts and minds...

localised_title.last_approved_text: A Whispering Campaign Falls on Fertile Soil

dilemmas.localised_title: A Whispering Campaign Falls on Fertile Soil

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are treated to a demonstration from three talented courtiers; one paints an evocative landscape, another recites a moving verse, and the third hits a target from four hundred metres, blindfolded. \n\n They look to you to judge who was best, and who should be rewarded...

dilemmas.localised_description: You are treated to a demonstration from three talented courtiers; one paints an evocative landscape, another recites a moving verse, and the third hits a target from four hundred metres, blindfolded. \n\n They look to you to judge who was best, and who should be rewarded...

localised_description.last_approved_text: You wander across two courtiers, locked in heated discussion. Compassion, one argues, is the most meritorious virtue, whilst another insists that righteousness should drive all action. \n\n You ponder their reasoning as they look to your opinion…

dilemmas.localised_description: You wander across two courtiers, locked in heated discussion. Compassion, one argues, is the most meritorious virtue, whilst another insists that righteousness should drive all action. \n\n You ponder their reasoning as they look to your opinion…

localised_description.last_approved_text: Insolence! The empress' nephew - an upstart by all accounts - has dared speak condescendingly towards the imperial heir. Can such an action be condoned? Surely not! You have the chance to intervene…

dilemmas.localised_description: Insolence! The empress' nephew - an upstart by all accounts - has dared speak condescendingly towards the imperial heir. Can such an action be condoned? Surely not! You have the chance to intervene…

localised_description.last_approved_text: A man comes before you, possessed (he insists) of a remarkable talent; he claims to know Chen Shou's [[i]]Records of the Three Kingdoms[[/i]] by heart. To prove it, he will tell you a character's tale, for a price… \n\n Whose story would you like to hear?

dilemmas.localised_description: A man comes before you, possessed (he insists) of a remarkable talent; he claims to know Chen Shou's [[i]]Records of the Three Kingdoms[[/i]] by heart. To prove it, he will tell you a character's tale, for a price… \n\n Whose story would you like to hear?

localised_description.last_approved_text: The scholar with the remarkable memory returns to you, offering another tale from the Three Kingdoms, again for a healthy stipend. Who do you wish to hear of this time?

dilemmas.localised_description: The scholar with the remarkable memory returns to you, offering another tale from the Three Kingdoms, again for a healthy stipend. Who do you wish to hear of this time?

localised_description.last_approved_text: Once again, the scholar returns, his encyclopaedic knowledge of the Three Kingdoms in tow. Of who should he speak this time?

dilemmas.localised_description: Once again, the scholar returns, his encyclopaedic knowledge of the Three Kingdoms in tow. Of who should he speak this time?

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are at a feast, and the celebratory libations have flowed like water. After some time, you are called upon to make a toast. \n\n There are so many things about which you could honour…

dilemmas.localised_description: You are at a feast, and the celebratory libations have flowed like water. After some time, you are called upon to make a toast. \n\n There are so many things about which you could honour…

localised_description.last_approved_text: A decree from the emperor himself has put you in jeopardy. Whilst you are sure he has been manipulated into such a decision, you unfortunately have to make a choice on how to proceed. Things could get ugly…

dilemmas.localised_description: A decree from the emperor himself has put you in jeopardy. Whilst you are sure he has been manipulated into such a decision, you unfortunately have to make a choice on how to proceed. Things could get ugly…

localised_description.last_approved_text: Emperor Hui, whose title you have usurped, has been brought before you. The former emperor's fate is in your hands.

dilemmas.localised_description: Emperor Hui, whose title you have usurped, has been brought before you. The former emperor's fate is in your hands.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The empress, deposed from her questionable regency, has chosen death over exile. She took her own life, as many do, by drinking gold-laced wine. \n\n How you act in the aftermath will be important…

dilemmas.localised_description: The empress, deposed from her questionable regency, has chosen death over exile. She took her own life, as many do, by drinking gold-laced wine. \n\n How you act in the aftermath will be important…

localised_description.last_approved_text: Although force has brought you all the way to the capital, the court - emperor and all - have heard of your violent reputation and have fled to seek refuge with another prince. \n\n Spurned by those vested with the power to legitimise you, there is but one other option: declare yourself emperor!

dilemmas.localised_description: Although force has brought you all the way to the capital, the court - emperor and all - have heard of your violent reputation and have fled to seek refuge with another prince. \n\n Spurned by those vested with the power to legitimise you, there is but one other option: declare yourself emperor!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Although force has brought you all the way to the capital, the court refuses to serve under one of inferior rank and have fled to seek refuge with another, more worthy prince. \n\n Spurned by those vested with the power to legitimise you, there is but one other option: declare yourself emperor!

dilemmas.localised_description: Although force has brought you all the way to the capital, the court refuses to serve under one of inferior rank and have fled to seek refuge with another, more worthy prince. \n\n Spurned by those vested with the power to legitimise you, there is but one other option: declare yourself emperor!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Although force has brought you all the way to the capital, the emperor is nowhere to be found - spirited away by another prince, perhaps. \n\n Without those vested with the power to legitimise you, the regency is out of your grasp - you can declare yourself emperor or attempt to reclaim the emperor from whoever now controls him.

dilemmas.localised_description: Although force has brought you all the way to the capital, the emperor is nowhere to be found - spirited away by another prince, perhaps. \n\n Without those vested with the power to legitimise you, the regency is out of your grasp - you can declare yourself emperor or attempt to reclaim the emperor from whoever now controls him.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Emperor is in Another Castle

dilemmas.localised_title: The Emperor is in Another Castle

localised_description.last_approved_text: One of your more error-prone retainers has unintentionally offended the empress. She now demands a formal, grovelling apology, yet your comrade insists they did nothing to warrant such a thing. \n\n You could apologise in their place, or reject her demands...

dilemmas.localised_description: One of your more error-prone retainers has unintentionally offended the empress. She now demands a formal, grovelling apology, yet your comrade insists they did nothing to warrant such a thing. \n\n You could apologise in their place, or reject her demands...

localised_description.last_approved_text: A member of your court has insulted the empress and she now demands that they are whipped by way of an apology and as a show of fealty. \n\n Whether the punishment is deserved is questionable, so you must now choose how to act…

dilemmas.localised_description: A member of your court has insulted the empress and she now demands that they are whipped by way of an apology and as a show of fealty. \n\n Whether the punishment is deserved is questionable, so you must now choose how to act…

localised_description.last_approved_text: A high-ranking member of your court has somehow caused the empress great offence. She demands their execution as recompense. \n\n This is a severe punishment, and you must decide if you think it is just enough to enact…

dilemmas.localised_description: A high-ranking member of your court has somehow caused the empress great offence. She demands their execution as recompense. \n\n This is a severe punishment, and you must decide if you think it is just enough to enact…

localised_description.last_approved_text: Some time ago, you gave the empress your word that you would sequester funds for the war effort. She comes to you now, demanding that money be delivered in full. \n\n How do you answer her demand?

dilemmas.localised_description: Some time ago, you gave the empress your word that you would sequester funds for the war effort. She comes to you now, demanding that money be delivered in full. \n\n How do you answer her demand?

localised_description.last_approved_text: For some time, you have been gathering resources, wise and judicious leader that you are. Yet such things are gathered to be used, so now it is time to decide how your boons will be put to use…

dilemmas.localised_description: For some time, you have been gathering resources, wise and judicious leader that you are. Yet such things are gathered to be used, so now it is time to decide how your boons will be put to use…

localised_description.last_approved_text: The people are starving. So says the empress, at least, who comes to you requesting a moderate, but not insignificant, amount of food to mitigate the citizens' plight. \n\n How do you respond?

dilemmas.localised_description: The people are starving. So says the empress, at least, who comes to you requesting a moderate, but not insignificant, amount of food to mitigate the citizens' plight. \n\n How do you respond?

localised_description.last_approved_text: The empress' garrison is in dire need of nourishment, she says. She comes to you to exact this nourishment, demanding a large quantity of food to feed her troops. \n\n What do you say to this demand?

dilemmas.localised_description: The empress' garrison is in dire need of nourishment, she says. She comes to you to exact this nourishment, demanding a large quantity of food to feed her troops. \n\n What do you say to this demand?

localised_description.last_approved_text: The empress has planned a lavish banquet, to be held in her honour, and tribute is demanded. She calls to you for a frankly staggering sum of food to aid in the tributary feast. \n\n Such a sum is eye-watering; how do you reply?

dilemmas.localised_description: The empress has planned a lavish banquet, to be held in her honour, and tribute is demanded. She calls to you for a frankly staggering sum of food to aid in the tributary feast. \n\n Such a sum is eye-watering; how do you reply?

localised_description.last_approved_text: The whims of the empress are capricious, and oft meaningless. Yet the meaningless is given meaning by the fact of her position and power. \n\n She demands you declare war on a thus-far neutral faction, and awaits your response…

dilemmas.localised_description: The whims of the empress are capricious, and oft meaningless. Yet the meaningless is given meaning by the fact of her position and power. \n\n She demands you declare war on a thus-far neutral faction, and awaits your response…

localised_description.last_approved_text: Allies and enemies are just words to the empress, whose favour is as fickle as the sea-blown breeze. \n\n She demands you declare war on a faction you find agreeable. Her demands are unfair, but you must choose your path carefully…

dilemmas.localised_description: Allies and enemies are just words to the empress, whose favour is as fickle as the sea-blown breeze. \n\n She demands you declare war on a faction you find agreeable. Her demands are unfair, but you must choose your path carefully…

localised_description.last_approved_text: A scout reports to you with a missive - intercepted, they say, on its way to parts elsewhere. Although the information within is valuable, there is also written vile untruths about you. \n\n You could destroy it, valuable information and all, to deny these slanders attention, but will you?

dilemmas.localised_description: A scout reports to you with a missive - intercepted, they say, on its way to parts elsewhere. Although the information within is valuable, there is also written vile untruths about you. \n\n You could destroy it, valuable information and all, to deny these slanders attention, but will you?

localised_description.last_approved_text: A loose-lipped courtier has told you of an indiscretion committed by a friend of theirs in another faction. This information could be used for extortion, but your courtier would be deeply upset at the breach of trust…

dilemmas.localised_description: A loose-lipped courtier has told you of an indiscretion committed by a friend of theirs in another faction. This information could be used for extortion, but your courtier would be deeply upset at the breach of trust…

localised_description.last_approved_text: One of your courtiers has loudly, and dramatically, denounced one of his opponents as a spy. In private, the accused admits this fact, but begs protection. In exchange, they will give you valuable, secret information…

dilemmas.localised_description: One of your courtiers has loudly, and dramatically, denounced one of his opponents as a spy. In private, the accused admits this fact, but begs protection. In exchange, they will give you valuable, secret information…

localised_description.last_approved_text: Politics is a game of popularity as much as it is one of substance. An official, loathed by his people, approaches you and offers valuable information. However, he demands you publicly honour him for it…

dilemmas.localised_description: Politics is a game of popularity as much as it is one of substance. An official, loathed by his people, approaches you and offers valuable information. However, he demands you publicly honour him for it…

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have made the ultimate sacrifice for the ultimate victory, spurning your brother to achieve glory for yourself.

dilemmas.localised_description: You have made the ultimate sacrifice for the ultimate victory, spurning your brother to achieve glory for yourself.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have, alone among the princes, remained a filial defender of your brother the emperor. With you as his protector and guide, a great future awaits.

dilemmas.localised_description: You have, alone among the princes, remained a filial defender of your brother the emperor. With you as his protector and guide, a great future awaits.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your unwavering belief in your cause and determination have inspired your forces to a glorious victory!

dilemmas.localised_description: Your unwavering belief in your cause and determination have inspired your forces to a glorious victory!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Through your humility and grace, you have inspired and uplifted the people, who have delivered you a resounding victory.

dilemmas.localised_description: Through your humility and grace, you have inspired and uplifted the people, who have delivered you a resounding victory.

localised_description.last_approved_text: In betraying you, the empress sealed her own fate. The path you have cut is one of blood, but you stand atop them all now, victorious.

dilemmas.localised_description: In betraying you, the empress sealed her own fate. The path you have cut is one of blood, but you stand atop them all now, victorious.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Despite the lies and calumny of your rivals, you have remained steadfastly loyal to the emperor. Your victory now is a testament to that loyalty!

dilemmas.localised_description: Despite the lies and calumny of your rivals, you have remained steadfastly loyal to the emperor. Your victory now is a testament to that loyalty!

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have taken your time, biding and waiting for the opportunity to strike. At last, your patience has rewarded you with victory, but the cost has been great…

dilemmas.localised_description: You have taken your time, biding and waiting for the opportunity to strike. At last, your patience has rewarded you with victory, but the cost has been great…

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have taken the direct path, cutting a swathe of blood through your enemies to reach the ultimate goal.

dilemmas.localised_description: You have taken the direct path, cutting a swathe of blood through your enemies to reach the ultimate goal.

localised_description.last_approved_text: They called you tempestuous. They called you unstable. Now they call you their leader. Your anger has driven you to ultimate success!

dilemmas.localised_description: They called you tempestuous. They called you unstable. Now they call you their leader. Your anger has driven you to ultimate success!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Through generosity of spirit, you have brought the people to your side. And with the people's support, you have risen to a just and righteous victory!

dilemmas.localised_description: Through generosity of spirit, you have brought the people to your side. And with the people's support, you have risen to a just and righteous victory!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your devotion to the people is remarkable, and they have repaid this devotion by carrying you a resounding victory!

dilemmas.localised_description: Your devotion to the people is remarkable, and they have repaid this devotion by carrying you a resounding victory!

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have accrued wealth and power beyond imagining; it is your strength and tenacity that has brought you to this, the apex of your ability!

dilemmas.localised_description: You have accrued wealth and power beyond imagining; it is your strength and tenacity that has brought you to this, the apex of your ability!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your trusted associates have guided you to victory, now it is time to ensure that their advise and counsel is not wasted. Now it is time to rule!

dilemmas.localised_description: Your trusted associates have guided you to victory, now it is time to ensure that their advise and counsel is not wasted. Now it is time to rule!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Through nobody's strength but your own, you have made your way to the very top, and your force of will is the only reason it is so!

dilemmas.localised_description: Through nobody's strength but your own, you have made your way to the very top, and your force of will is the only reason it is so!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Although you have left your honour in the dirt, you did not need it to reach the highest peak. Victory is yours, and honour? Honour is nothing

dilemmas.localised_description: Although you have left your honour in the dirt, you did not need it to reach the highest peak. Victory is yours, and honour? Honour is nothing

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have managed to rise to be an ultimate authority, yet you did not sacrifice your honour or ideals. This is a true victory.

dilemmas.localised_description: You have managed to rise to be an ultimate authority, yet you did not sacrifice your honour or ideals. This is a true victory.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is always a choice that must be made if one is to achieve greatness. Before you lie two options: build an realm of culture and worth or deny your enemies their advancement by crushing them in the field.

dilemmas.localised_description: There is always a choice that must be made if one is to achieve greatness. Before you lie two options: build an realm of culture and worth or deny your enemies their advancement by crushing them in the field.

localised_title.last_approved_text: A New Dynasty: Build or Destroy?

dilemmas.localised_title: A New Dynasty: Build or Destroy?

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is always a choice that must be made if one is to achieve greatness. Before you lie two options: foster a network of allies and build a new, unified future, or exercise your will and bend them to it.

dilemmas.localised_description: There is always a choice that must be made if one is to achieve greatness. Before you lie two options: foster a network of allies and build a new, unified future, or exercise your will and bend them to it.

localised_title.last_approved_text: A New Dynasty: Domination or Peace?

dilemmas.localised_title: A New Dynasty: Domination or Peace?

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is always a choice that must be made if one is to achieve greatness. Before you lie two options: develop your court into a cadre of seasoned, wise scholars and warriors, or see that your people's needs are met, that they want for nothing. \n\n This mission will have stretching goals, but powerful permanent effects.

dilemmas.localised_description: There is always a choice that must be made if one is to achieve greatness. Before you lie two options: develop your court into a cadre of seasoned, wise scholars and warriors, or see that your people's needs are met, that they want for nothing. \n\n This mission will have stretching goals, but powerful permanent effects.

localised_title.last_approved_text: A New Dynasty: The Few or the Many?

dilemmas.localised_title: A New Dynasty: The Few or the Many?

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is always a choice that must be made, if one is to achieve greatness. Before you lie two options: build an army that will be the terror of the known world, or amass a fortune so vast that your land will be the envy of the realm. \n\n This mission will have stretching goals, but powerful permanent effects.

dilemmas.localised_description: There is always a choice that must be made, if one is to achieve greatness. Before you lie two options: build an army that will be the terror of the known world, or amass a fortune so vast that your land will be the envy of the realm. \n\n This mission will have stretching goals, but powerful permanent effects.

localised_title.last_approved_text: A New Dynasty: Men or Money?

dilemmas.localised_title: A New Dynasty: Men or Money?

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is always a choice that must be made, if one is to achieve greatness. Before you lie two options: expand your realm to encompass as many commanderies as possible, or amass so much wealth as to make the world gasp. \n\n This mission will have stretching goals, but powerful permanent effects.

dilemmas.localised_description: There is always a choice that must be made, if one is to achieve greatness. Before you lie two options: expand your realm to encompass as many commanderies as possible, or amass so much wealth as to make the world gasp. \n\n This mission will have stretching goals, but powerful permanent effects.

localised_title.last_approved_text: A New Dynasty: Land or Money?

dilemmas.localised_title: A New Dynasty: Land or Money?

localised_description.last_approved_text: The emperor has decreed Wei Guan and Sima Liang, formerly regents of the realm, are traitors and to be arrested. You have been tasked by the empress with dealing with their nearby allies - yet how vigorously do you pursue them? \n\n [[i]]In the Eight Princes campaign the choices you make can influence your Alignment in one of four ways, which in turn can affect what happens at key points in the campaign[[/i]]

dilemmas.localised_description: The emperor has decreed Wei Guan and Sima Liang, formerly regents of the realm, are traitors and to be arrested. You have been tasked by the empress with dealing with their nearby allies - yet how vigorously do you pursue them? \n\n [[i]]In the Eight Princes campaign the choices you make can influence your Alignment in one of four ways, which in turn can affect what happens at key points in the campaign[[/i]]

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Empress Demands that Traitors be Crushed!

dilemmas.localised_title: The Empress Demands that Traitors be Crushed!

localised_description.last_approved_text:
The empress has called for your arrest! She has managed to fool the emperor into declaring you a traitor. Although she dare not dirty her hands herself, two of the princes of Jin - led by Sima Wei - descend upon you. 

 The situation may seem desperate, yet there are options... 

 [[i]]In the Eight Princes campaign the choices you make can influence your Alignment in one of four ways, which in turn can affect what happens at key points in the campaign[[/i]]

You have been tasked by the empress with dealing with their nearby allies - yet how vigorously do you pursue them? \n\n [[i]]In the Eight Princes campaign the choices you make can influence your Alignment in one of four ways, which in turn can affect what happens at key points in the campaign[[/i]]

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Empress Demands that Traitors be Crushed!

dilemmas.localised_title: The Empress Demands that Traitors be Crushed!

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is clear now that many have seen opportunity in the chaos at court, and their own treasonous desires have manifest. The empress has charged you with being the sword of justice that cuts down these would-be usurpers!

dilemmas.localised_description: It is clear now that many have seen opportunity in the chaos at court, and their own treasonous desires have manifest. The empress has charged you with being the sword of justice that cuts down these would-be usurpers!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Empress Demands that Traitors be Crushed!

dilemmas.localised_title: The Empress Demands that Traitors be Crushed!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The empress holds the emperor in a tight grip, but whispers from court confirm that he has an unsigned decree that would depose his captor. \n\n If we could obtain this imperial order we would hold the fate of the dynasty in our hands…

dilemmas.localised_description: The empress holds the emperor in a tight grip, but whispers from court confirm that he has an unsigned decree that would depose his captor. \n\n If we could obtain this imperial order we would hold the fate of the dynasty in our hands…

localised_description.last_approved_text: Over your long career, you have grown strong and, importantly, talented. The empress sees your continued growth, and believes you to be a worthy protector of the throne as trouble continues to foment across the land…

dilemmas.localised_description: Over your long career, you have grown strong and, importantly, talented. The empress sees your continued growth, and believes you to be a worthy protector of the throne as trouble continues to foment across the land…

localised_title.last_approved_text: A Protectorate of all the Talents

dilemmas.localised_title: A Protectorate of all the Talents

localised_description.last_approved_text: With the wolves of war snapping at the empress' heels, she at last turns to you for protection. To think, the imperial throne could be yours after all this time, and without so much as a fight…

dilemmas.localised_description: With the wolves of war snapping at the empress' heels, she at last turns to you for protection. To think, the imperial throne could be yours after all this time, and without so much as a fight…

localised_description.last_approved_text: The empress knows you as one of humility and grace, as do all. It is in this knowledge that she believes that she can trust you, and you alone, to protect the emperor. \n\n Whilst the other princes prowl and plot, she believes you to be devoted to the dynasty...

dilemmas.localised_description: The empress knows you as one of humility and grace, as do all. It is in this knowledge that she believes that she can trust you, and you alone, to protect the emperor. \n\n Whilst the other princes prowl and plot, she believes you to be devoted to the dynasty...

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are a man of the people, and well-known for it. Your concern for the common folk does you credit. \n\n It is unsurprising, then, that the empress has turned to you now, in her hour of need…

dilemmas.localised_description: You are a man of the people, and well-known for it. Your concern for the common folk does you credit. \n\n It is unsurprising, then, that the empress has turned to you now, in her hour of need…

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your reputation for nobility and mercy is known across the land. The empress has played the game poorly, and now faces foes on all fronts. In her desperation, she turns to you for protection…

dilemmas.localised_description: Your reputation for nobility and mercy is known across the land. The empress has played the game poorly, and now faces foes on all fronts. In her desperation, she turns to you for protection…

localised_description.last_approved_text: The empress has enemies everywhere, and the closer she draws around her husband, the more she will make. \n\n You are known as one of great honour, and so the empress has come to you, beset, seeking your protection.

dilemmas.localised_description: The empress has enemies everywhere, and the closer she draws around her husband, the more she will make. \n\n You are known as one of great honour, and so the empress has come to you, beset, seeking your protection.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are generous, and this generosity is known across the land. The emperor has seen this, and is willing to accept you as his sole protector on this basis. And for a sufficient price, of course…

dilemmas.localised_description: You are generous, and this generosity is known across the land. The emperor has seen this, and is willing to accept you as his sole protector on this basis. And for a sufficient price, of course…

localised_description.last_approved_text: The emperor, your kin, is beset by the avarice of the other Jin princes. The empress, knowing of your filial devotion, pleads with you to aid her and defend her husband from their greed. But you know the empress cares only for her own skin - perhaps you should instead take the opportunity to free the emperor from her clutches...

dilemmas.localised_description: The emperor, your kin, is beset by the avarice of the other Jin princes. The empress, knowing of your filial devotion, pleads with you to aid her and defend her husband from their greed. But you know the empress cares only for her own skin - perhaps you should instead take the opportunity to free the emperor from her clutches...

localised_description.last_approved_text: The harvest was good, and the people are glad of it. They offer to you a surplus of their taxes from this year to you, as a mark of their gratitude.

dilemmas.localised_description: The harvest was good, and the people are glad of it. They offer to you a surplus of their taxes from this year to you, as a mark of their gratitude.

localised_description.last_approved_text:
Without your command, one of your retainers is aggressively driving peasants from their lands and centralising land-ownership in a commandery. 

 This has reduced the amount of tax-paying peasants, but public maintenance and administration has risen.

 Do you stop this?

dilemmas.localised_description:
Without your command, one of your retainers is aggressively driving peasants from their lands and centralising land-ownership in a commandery. 

 This has reduced the amount of tax-paying peasants, but public maintenance and administration has risen.

 Do you stop this?

localised_description.last_approved_text: The peasants finally flourish and prosper with their overly-greedy landowners curtailed. However, with their authority checked, order in the commandery has slipped; how to rectify this situation?

dilemmas.localised_description: The peasants finally flourish and prosper with their overly-greedy landowners curtailed. However, with their authority checked, order in the commandery has slipped; how to rectify this situation?

localised_description.last_approved_text: The landlords have their uses – the peasants know their place and do as they are told. Yet as they accrue ever-increasing power, they abuse it more and more. \n\n Corruption is rising under their lazy watch. How to combat it?

dilemmas.localised_description: The landlords have their uses – the peasants know their place and do as they are told. Yet as they accrue ever-increasing power, they abuse it more and more. \n\n Corruption is rising under their lazy watch. How to combat it?

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Minister of Finance must not make any exceptions for missed tax payments, and so this too goes for his officials in the commanderies. \n\n A village claims to be unable to pays its household tax, citing poor harvests. Yet law is law; what is to be done with them?

dilemmas.localised_description: The Minister of Finance must not make any exceptions for missed tax payments, and so this too goes for his officials in the commanderies. \n\n A village claims to be unable to pays its household tax, citing poor harvests. Yet law is law; what is to be done with them?

localised_description.last_approved_text: The taxes are set by the Minister of Finance, and they must be met - there is no room for error. Yet a second village has come to you, telling you they cannot meet their taxes. \n\n Your courtiers whisper that you were too lenient on the last village, and you risk being taken advantage of...

dilemmas.localised_description: The taxes are set by the Minister of Finance, and they must be met - there is no room for error. Yet a second village has come to you, telling you they cannot meet their taxes. \n\n Your courtiers whisper that you were too lenient on the last village, and you risk being taken advantage of...

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Ministry of Education has submitted their final review of the Nine-Rank allocations. Upsettingly, one of your retainer's clients has received a lower rank than they expected. \n\n Your retainer asks that you correct this obvious mistake if they are able. They also offer, of course, to cover any necessary costs...

dilemmas.localised_description: The Ministry of Education has submitted their final review of the Nine-Rank allocations. Upsettingly, one of your retainer's clients has received a lower rank than they expected. \n\n Your retainer asks that you correct this obvious mistake if they are able. They also offer, of course, to cover any necessary costs...

localised_description.last_approved_text: A local magnate, his strength and manpower exhausted by years of war, has resorted to raiding the territory of another prince, stealing the manpower he needs. \n\n Naturally, the prince has complained and demanded his peasants be returned. You must adjudicate.

dilemmas.localised_description: A local magnate, his strength and manpower exhausted by years of war, has resorted to raiding the territory of another prince, stealing the manpower he needs. \n\n Naturally, the prince has complained and demanded his peasants be returned. You must adjudicate.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have learned through whispers and missives that the empress plans to condemn you as an enemy of the state. There is very little time - do you strike first, or let her decree do its worst?

dilemmas.localised_description: You have learned through whispers and missives that the empress plans to condemn you as an enemy of the state. There is very little time - do you strike first, or let her decree do its worst?

localised_description.last_approved_text: The birds whistle to you grave news - the empress has decided that you are too much of a threat, and plots to move against you. You must decide: wait to see how she acts, or strike first?

dilemmas.localised_description: The birds whistle to you grave news - the empress has decided that you are too much of a threat, and plots to move against you. You must decide: wait to see how she acts, or strike first?

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are known for your direct, even blunt, nature, and in having played your hand you have attracted the suspicion of the empress. \n\n For your efforts, she seems ready to brand you a public enemy.

dilemmas.localised_description: You are known for your direct, even blunt, nature, and in having played your hand you have attracted the suspicion of the empress. \n\n For your efforts, she seems ready to brand you a public enemy.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It has become apparent, now, that someone of your ambition cannot idly remain loyal to the emperor. \n\n The empress, however, knows of your desires, and is plotting to stop your continued acquisition of power…

dilemmas.localised_description: It has become apparent, now, that someone of your ambition cannot idly remain loyal to the emperor. \n\n The empress, however, knows of your desires, and is plotting to stop your continued acquisition of power…

localised_description.last_approved_text: The empress has her husband firmly within her grasp, and as such the dynasty is hers to control. \n\n She now worries that you seek to wrest control of the emperor from her, and so is plotting to move against you and secure her rule!

dilemmas.localised_description: The empress has her husband firmly within her grasp, and as such the dynasty is hers to control. \n\n She now worries that you seek to wrest control of the emperor from her, and so is plotting to move against you and secure her rule!

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is not unfair to say that you are an ambitious ruler, always seeking more power, and in your quest for greater authority the people have suffered. \n\n The empress has decided that war with you would bolster her own reputation, and rallies against you.

dilemmas.localised_description: It is not unfair to say that you are an ambitious ruler, always seeking more power, and in your quest for greater authority the people have suffered. \n\n The empress has decided that war with you would bolster her own reputation, and rallies against you.

localised_description.last_approved_text: In her ardent desire to eliminate you, the empress has underestimated your tenacity - and your power. She has made you an intractable enemy, and her actions leave only one course of action available…

dilemmas.localised_description: In her ardent desire to eliminate you, the empress has underestimated your tenacity - and your power. She has made you an intractable enemy, and her actions leave only one course of action available…

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have been a stalwart and vicious sword of the empress, but your belligerence has grown to be too much, it seems. \n\n The empress is threatened by your actions, and seems ready to attempt to put her attack dog down…

dilemmas.localised_description: You have been a stalwart and vicious sword of the empress, but your belligerence has grown to be too much, it seems. \n\n The empress is threatened by your actions, and seems ready to attempt to put her attack dog down…

localised_description.last_approved_text: At last, you have total control of the capital. One of your kin, Sima Ai - a highly-respected prince of Jin and brother to the emperor - comes to you and suggests that together you can protect the emperor in a co-regency. \n\n As a show of his loyalty, he offers you valuable information. However, if you reveal it to his enemies, it may be enough to convince the court that you alone can rule as regent...

dilemmas.localised_description: At last, you have total control of the capital. One of your kin, Sima Ai - a highly-respected prince of Jin and brother to the emperor - comes to you and suggests that together you can protect the emperor in a co-regency. \n\n As a show of his loyalty, he offers you valuable information. However, if you reveal it to his enemies, it may be enough to convince the court that you alone can rule as regent...

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have marched into the capital and the regency is yours for the taking. \n\n However, an unpopular general is eyed suspiciously by the court - he could very easily be your undoing…

dilemmas.localised_description: You have marched into the capital and the regency is yours for the taking. \n\n However, an unpopular general is eyed suspiciously by the court - he could very easily be your undoing…

localised_description.last_approved_text: When you finally enter the capital, it is a muted affair - not at all the celebration you anticipated. In a hushed, but poignant meeting, you are offered regency over the contested emperor…

dilemmas.localised_description: When you finally enter the capital, it is a muted affair - not at all the celebration you anticipated. In a hushed, but poignant meeting, you are offered regency over the contested emperor…

localised_description.last_approved_text: As you march into the capital, it is a scene of adulation and joy! The empress and the court, thrilled to see you, practically beg you to assume the regency and defend them against the other princes. \n\n You are here at last, but has your honour thus far been genuine or a pretence?

dilemmas.localised_description: As you march into the capital, it is a scene of adulation and joy! The empress and the court, thrilled to see you, practically beg you to assume the regency and defend them against the other princes. \n\n You are here at last, but has your honour thus far been genuine or a pretence?

localised_description.last_approved_text:
Marching into the capital, your reputation flowing before you, the people practically demand you assume the regency. 

 They offer you the Nine Gifts of Investiture - offered but only ever taken by would-be usurpers. 

 Lu Zhi, your advisor, recommends you reject them.

dilemmas.localised_description:
Marching into the capital, your reputation flowing before you, the people practically demand you assume the regency. 

 They offer you the Nine Gifts of Investiture - offered but only ever taken by would-be usurpers. 

 Lu Zhi, your advisor, recommends you reject them.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As you march into the capital, it is a scene of adulation and joy! The empress and the court, thrilled to see you, practically beg you to assume the regency and defend them against the other princes. \n\n You are here at last, but has your generosity thus far been genuine or a pretence?

dilemmas.localised_description: As you march into the capital, it is a scene of adulation and joy! The empress and the court, thrilled to see you, practically beg you to assume the regency and defend them against the other princes. \n\n You are here at last, but has your generosity thus far been genuine or a pretence?

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your march into the capital is welcomed with relief and cheers; surely you do not march to harm your beloved brother, they think. \n\n You are offered regency over the emperor at last, and you take a moment to consider…

dilemmas.localised_description: Your march into the capital is welcomed with relief and cheers; surely you do not march to harm your beloved brother, they think. \n\n You are offered regency over the emperor at last, and you take a moment to consider…

localised_description.last_approved_text: At last, you enter the capital, and are welcomed by the court. The regency is yours to take, but after so long has your patience finally run its course? \n\n Sun Xiu, your trusted advisor, advises striking now rather than cowing to the paltry regency!

dilemmas.localised_description: At last, you enter the capital, and are welcomed by the court. The regency is yours to take, but after so long has your patience finally run its course? \n\n Sun Xiu, your trusted advisor, advises striking now rather than cowing to the paltry regency!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Good Things Come to Those Who Wait

dilemmas.localised_title: Good Things Come to Those Who Wait
